title: 3s team looking for members. Preferable bronze and silver elo.
body: Looking for bronze and silver members to play ranked 3s with tonight. Skill doesn't matter, we just want to throw back some games and get ward skins. reply if interested.

replies.body: I'm up for it. Want that ward skin as well. Silver 2
add me i will play i am silver 3
What's up add me I'm down to play
